roleset.name: priced attainably

role.descr: entity able to pay for arg1

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'afford.01'.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: = By that time , homes of 100 thousand yuan per square meters will be ubiquitous and will not be affordable for most . Yet affluent people in society can afford it , while others will have no choice but to rent .
example.arg: homes of 100 yuan per square meters
